data.title: St. Catharines – HQ
data.text:
Make a well-judged decision with flexible office space in St. Catharines. Based in the most populous city in Canada’s Niagara Region, attract colleagues and clients from Toronto 113km away, and the United States with the international boundary just 19km away. Being served by two major freeways means you’re always accessible. Commute easily with King St + Queen St Bus Stop and St. Catharines Train Station just a 53m and 1.7km walk away, respectively. Looking to expand your business globally? Get client relationships off to a flying start by greeting them face to face at John C. Munro Hamilton International Airport, approximately 68km away by car.

Help business blossom in St. Catharines with strong foundations around you, all set in a beautiful location officially nicknamed “The Garden City” due to its 1,000 acres of parks, gardens, and trails. Our modern building in the heart of downtown has everything you need to stay on top of business, including fully furnished coworking spaces, stylish meeting rooms and quiet private offices. Log on and stay connected throughout the day with business-grade WiFi always at hand. When it’s time to escape the desk, sit back and relax in nearby picturesque parks, or unwind in the local art gallery or cinema.
